metadata.title: CVE-2019-11325 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Symfony before 4.2.12 and 4.3.x before 4.3.8. The VarExport component incorrectly escapes strings, allowing some specially crafted ones to escalate to execution of arbitrary PHP code. This is related to symfony/var-exporter.

criterions.comment: symfony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.8+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
